title: Unable to connect to the login queue on NA server!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Working on fixing this as soon as we can!  We're currently undergoing maintenance, which has resulted in some login problems for a few players on NA.  We'll be posting in the [maintenance thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/PTQej3Tj-june-7th-na-ranked-disabled-for-live-maintenance) with updates in the meantime.  Hang tight!
